modName: Sonea - from The Black Magician books
summary: Sonea have two choices: either start a proper life full of knowledge and honor in the College of Winterhold, or a shadow and greedy life along with those who can help her avoiding the mages, in the Thieves Guild.
descriptionHtml:
[color=cornflowerblue][size=4][b]Play as one of the main characters of the trilogy [i]The Black Magician[/i] ![/b][/size][/color]

[i]A simple mod that allows you to begin Skyrim in a different way.[/i]

There are some tiny differences between Mage Sonea and Thief Sonea.


[color=cornflowerblue][b]REQUIRES THE MOD: Apachii Hair[/b][/color]
(Based on [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557]Live Another Life[/url])

[b]Installation guide:[/b]
[list]
[*]Drag the file to C:\\Users\\[color=red]\"Your user name\"[/color]\\Documents\\my games\\skyrim\\saves
[/list]

\"Alternative Start: Elios, a WoodElf Hunter\" in progress.

[i]I was looking for a start like this and, as there is none, I\'ve decided to make it myself.
It\'s not a complex mod and I don\'t deserve any kind of renown, as there are mods with more potential than this one.[/i]

[color=cornflowerblue][size=4]Hope you like it anyway![/size][/color]
author: NsisHD aka Sazyo
